# Bickley and Sundridge (ward)

| electorate =

Bickley and Sundridge is an electoral ward in the London Borough of Bromley. The ward was first used in the 2022 elections and elects three councillors to Bromley London Borough Council.
Geography
The ward is named after the suburbs of Bickley and Sundridge.
